about_the_game:
Fox4Elite is a first (and third) person strategic shooter for PC with multiplayer and VR versions in the works.
The player battles against a female clone army by commanding two fireteams of two elite female agents each.
Each fireteam can be directed to strategic parts of the map in order to defeat the enemy.
If the player dies, all is not lost, they can then direct any surviving agents via third person view in order to win the match.

Key Features:
  • Dynamic Interaction With Agent NPCs
  • High difficulty requiring strategic gameplay to succeed.
  • Visceral highly detailed damage and combat reactions.
  • Intuitive gameplay and player controls
  • Selectable Slow Motion Bullet Camera
  • Multi-stage Animated NPC Ragdoll engine

We would especially like to express our appreciation to Bodak1984 who kindly permitted the use of his fantastic artwork in the game's storyboards.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains moderate violence and gore consistent with a typical first and third person shooter game

name: Fox4Elite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3210M CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Fox4Elite is a dynamic female FPS and TPS strategic shooter - fast paced and challenging. Lead a team of highly skilled Agents in order to defeat a murderous female clone army. Deploy your Agent fire teams for strategic advantage against the enemy and survive to complete the mission objectives
